meshmesh¶

Description¶

Creates a mesh from a label image.

Usage example¶

  1. Open a terminal and go to the directory of the “Ernie” example data set.

  2. Run

meshmesh m2m_ernie/label_prep/tissue_labeling_upsampled.nii.gz ernie_again.msh

  1. The ernie_again.msh file will be more or less the same as the m2m_ernie/ernie.msh

Further notes¶

  • Type meshmesh -h for more information and options

  • Please see How to create and use a custom mesh for further information
